R.V.collage of Engneering

Mysore Road, Bangalore
{% load static %}
RVCE Bangalore is a private technical college that was established in 1963 and is approved by AICTE. In addition to this, it has also been accredited by NBA. RVCE is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University. RV College of Engineering was ranked 96 for BTech by NIRF in 2023. The college offers UG and PG courses across various streams such as Sciences, Engineering, Computer Applications, and others through 14 departments. RV College of Engineering offers scholarships to students on a merit-cum-means basis. Provides an ideal ambience to stimulate the teaching-learning process, helping in bringing out skilled and disciplined Engineers. Rated one amongst the top ten self-financing Engineering Institutions in the country. Current annual student intake for Undergraduate Programmes & Post Graduate Programmes in Engineering is in excess of 1200. Highly qualified and dedicated faculty. Utilizes its expertise in various disciplines to conduct Research and Development for Industry and Defense establishments in the country
Admission to all the B.Tech Programmes for the year 2024 is based on any one of the following: 10th Std: Min 70%. in Science & Mathematics subjects separately. 11th Std: Min 65% in Maths & Physics subjects separately. 12th Std: if results are announced: Min. 60% in Physics & Mathematics subjects separately.
  • Candidate should compulsorily appear and have to obtained a rank in KEA 2023 / COMED-K 2023 / JEE-MAINS 2023
  • If candidate has studied other than Indian board, then, they have to compulsory apply and get equivalence certificate from Association of Indian Universities (AIU) from New Delhi. Visit www.aiu.ac.in for details.

    • We are happy that you have found interest at R.V. College of Engineering.
    Application for BTech 2024 is open.

    B.Tech courses available:

    • B.Tech Computer Science Engineering
    • B.Tech Artificial Intelligence Engineering
    • B.Tech Electronics and Communication Engineering
    • B.Tech Electrical and Electronics Engineering
    • B.Tech Mechanical Engineering
